items.title: OPEC+ Reaffirms Output Pause as Eight Producers Cite Market Stability
items.summary: OPEC+ confirmed on Sunday that it will keep oil production steady through the first quarter of 2026, as eight key producers reaffirmed their commitment to market stability amid a steady global economic outlook and what they described as healthy oil m

items.title: Delegates: OPEC+ Set to Hold Output Steady Despite Political Turmoil
items.summary: OPEC+ is expected to reaffirm its decision to keep oil production steady through the first quarter of 2026 when key members meet on Sunday, despite rising geopolitical tensions and fresh uncertainty surrounding Venezuela, according to multiple delega
